TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IOReceivePort extends MonoMac.Kernel.Mach.Port

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.OSMessageID msgType) cil managed

Docs.param: Type of message to be sent to this port.
Docs.summary: Creates a mach port suitable for receiving IOKit messages of the specified type.
Docs.remarks: In the future IOKit may use specialized messages and ports instead of the standard ports created by mach_port_allocate(). Use this function instead of mach_port_allocate() to ensure compatibility with future revisions of IOKit.
